title: Nice short walk
text: There’s not a huge amount to do in Hungerford, but went on this quaint short walk after lunch. Would recommend for something quick to do after lunch or looking at the ma y antique shops

title: Fantastic place
text: Went here for lunch with a friend. A real gem. We visited Hungerford for a few hours and this place was probably the best place in Hungerford. The service was really good and the food was amazing. Great choice and very tasty. I would absolutely recommend this place.

title: Disgraceful
text: I’ve never given a bad review, but today unfortunately is the day. Went here today (twice - once in the morning and then in the afternoon) ... but the afternoon visit was terrible. No public relation skills at all ... no eye contact, not friendly, even rolling of eyes. Will not go again.

title: Really nice food
text: Went here for an evening meal. Really nice place. Service was good and the food really tasty. Will be going here again. Would highly recommend.

title: Very nice food
text: Went here for a birthday meal. Nice little restaurant with friendly, helpful service. Loved the food - would recommend. Very tasty.

title: Fantastic
text: We loved this place. We were looking for somewhere for breakfast and chose this place. We can thoroughly recommend it. It has a lovely atmosphere and very good service. Our breakfasts were lovely!

title: Good to visit
text: We visited this castle with our family. It’s not a huge castle but worth the visit. It’s not too expensive to get in. It has a lovely view of the river and surrounding area. If your in Chepstow it’s worth visiting the castle.

title: Very enjoyable
text: Stayed here as a family. The service was really good, they were very helpful at reception. The rooms were lovely and very clean. We also had a great view from the rooms. Food was reasonably priced and tasty. Stayed for one night and enjoyed the whole time. We also took advantage of using the pool and the gym. Great.
place: St. Pierre Marriott Hotel & Country Club

title: Very nice
text: Had a meal here ... very nice place. Service very good and very quick. Husband loved the T-bone steak - big portion and tender

title: Good coffee and great atmosphere
text: Went there this morning for a coffee ... very impressive. Great decor, great spot, great service and really good coffee.

title: A favourite restaurant
text: We’ve been here a few times ... can’t rave enough about the food and the quality. Really tasty and so authentic. Very good service too.

title: Very posh
text: We went here with the family and enjoyed a nice high tea. Had a lovely time ... good service and tasty food.

title: Great view
text: We always take visitors for a walk across the Clifton suspension bridge. Amazing view, well worth the walk across.

title: Well worth a visit
text: Situation in a lovely park area in Bristol. Really worth visiting ... can a climb up the tower bit a great view. Plenty of very friendly squirrels too!

title: A favourite farm shop cafe
text:
We visit this farm shop regularly. It’s in a gorgeous location. It has plenty of seating inside and out. Sells light lunches and cakes.
There is the cafe, farm shop and antique store. Good range of goods in the farm shop.

title: Very nice cafe, quaint and food always good
text: We have been here on quite a few occasions. There is seating inside and outside. Lovely to sit outside in their garden courtyard in the summer months. Food is reasonably priced and always tasty.

title: One of our favourite spots in Bristol
text: We eat at Bills very often. Great atmosphere and decor. Plenty of room and seating. The staff are always very pleasant and helpful. Food is very tasty, plenty to choose from and always fresh.

title: Really nice spot
text: This cafe is in a great area. Inside is very quirky - sat in the snug on the third floor. If you like good strong coffee then this is the place.

title: Amazing - highly recommended
text: Had lunch here with friends - the meals were fantastic. Very tasty and large portions. Great service..

title: Love this place
text: Zsa zsa always lives up to my expectations. Great food, very high quality. Love the Indian and Chinese the best and the variety of desserts.

title: Ok for coffee
text: Went here quickly for afternoon tea. Service was very friendly. Coffee was ok. Hot chocolate average. The carrot cake didn’t have too much flavour and icing was a bit thick and sweet. Overall ok.

title: Always quick and tasty
text: Always enjoy our meal when we go to Wahaca in Bristol. The food is always fresh and fast and the service always good.

title: Nice old accommodation
text: Stayed here with our family. The rooms are nice and location is pretty. The staff were also nice, but the walls of the rooms are too thin. You can hear the people in the rooms next door very clearly. And the windows are not thick so outside noise from the road is also clear.

title: Love this place - immaculate
text: We love this place - been multiple times. The rooms are quaint and clean. The restaurant is lovely. Food good and lovely decor. The staff are pleasant and helpful. Price wise it is very reasonable. We would record this place.

title: Nice area, interesting caves
text: Went here on a lovely April day - the weather was lovely and the view just as nice. The caves were worth the visit.

title: Amazing! One of my favourite places in the UK
text: We took the boat trip to Farne islands and it was amazing. The bird life was incredible. Everyone needs to go to the Farne islands.

title: Love this place
text: The food here is amazing - I love it. They spicy chai tea is the nicest I have ever tasted also! Good service.

title: Fantastic castle
text: This is one of my favourite castles in Wales. Climb to the top to see the beautiful view. Always a pleasure to visit.

title: Lovely area and sights
text: We went to Chedworth villa on a cold November day, but it didnt disappoint. Great history and sights. Took the free tour which was very informative.

title: Piece of history
text: A wall of Hadrians library in busy Monastiraki. Impressive sight passed by so many on a daily basis.

title: Very good service and friendly
text: We sat at a table at the windows at the back of the restaurant- lovely view. The service was good and very friendly with free biscuits at the end which were very nice!

title: Amazing and fun experience
text: Had a foot fish spa ... enjoyed the experience. Worth doing for something different. Reasonably priced and good service.
place: Doctor Fish Athens - Day Spa & Nail Bar

title: Very good meal - large servings!
text: Look for somewhere to eat on a rainy Athens day. Chose this restaurant and were not disappointed. Beautiful meal, large servings.

title: Great service great food
text: We loved this restaurant. Lovely food - large portions. Really good service. Nice atmosphere with live music. Would recommend eating here.

title: Nice meal and large servings
text: Had a meal here ... food was nice and very big servings. In a very good area just near the Plaka district.

title: One of the best in Athens
text: This restaurant was one of our favourites in Athens. Very affordable and very tasty. Customer service was very good. It is located in the Koukaki areawhich is about a 20 min walk from Acropolis area. This is a must go to restaurant.

title: This is a must do in Athens
text: When in Athens spent lots of time in this district. Filled with shops, markets, cafes. Amazing atmosphere.

title: Yummy
text: This is a must see visit in Athens. The food is amazing. It has sweet and savoury food. Everything you can imagine. Can get very busy though.

title: Lovely area beautiful view
text: Short drive from Athens. Lovely spot. Very peaceful. It was nice just to sit and relax and take in the history and the view.

title: Interesting
text: We jumped off the hop on hop off bus to visit this - not expensive to visit but we didn’t pay to go in because we could enjoy the view from the front

title: Amazing view
text: This was a nice trip up the side of the hill and then the view at the top is really amazing. Customer service wasn’t that great at the bottom where you buy the ticket - but otherwise everything ok.

title: Hidden treasure
text: We stumbled upon this on our way to the markets of Athens. A nice surprise with a lovely view of the Acropolis behind it on the hill.

title: A highlight for us - fantastic view
text: Beautiful spot with a wonderful view of Athens and the Acropolis. Great view day and night. Very historical spot.

title: Beautiful area of Athens
text: Walked to this area in our first evening in Athens. Lovely area to walk, it was very peaceful. Lots to see and do.

title: Amazing feat and worth seeing.
text: We took the time to visit the Corinth canal and it was well worth it. Amazing feat of engineering. There are a few souvenir shops there and a couple of eatery’s.

title: Fantastic place!
text: Amazing place with its ruins and amazing views. Plenty of walking, but easy, not difficult. This is a must see if you are in the area.

title: Worth a visit
text: Very quaint shopping area with restaurants and cafes. Everyone very friendly. Ancient Corinth was an enjoyable visit ... spent a good hour wandering through the ruins. Fantastic history and a reasonably priced attraction.

title: Highlight of our Greece trip
text: This is an absolute must see if you are in the area. Fantastic place with history, ruins and views. Take good walking shoes and enjoy.

title: Amazing
text: You will not be disappointed with a trip to the Parthenon. Wonderful history and sights. Reasonably priced.

title: A must see
text: Plaka district is a must do and must see place in Athens. Filled with shops, cafes and quaint streets.

title: Awesome
text: Fantastic place to visit. Well worth the trip. Lots of history and things to see. Amazing view. This is a must see.

title: Hidden gem in Athens
text: Fantastic place ... the food tasted amazing and the service was wonderful. Very nice little cafe also treated us with some small free gifts.
